lexUnit.name: front.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the side or part of an object that presents itself to view or that is normally seen or used first.

sentence.text: Occasionally the front of the sledge runner , about 2 or 3 metres in front of me , hits a hummock of snow and my face is thwacked by a handful of icy flour .
